verses.verse: And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H899>cloths<s%> of <S%H8278>service,<s%> to do <S%H8334>service<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H8336>linen.<s%> <S%H7806><s%>

And they did <S%H7554>beat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> into thin <S%H6341>plates,<s%> and <S%H7112>cut<s%> it into <S%H6616>wires,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> it <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and <S%H8432>in<s%> the fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> with <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> shoulder <S%H3802>pieces<s%> for it, to couple it <S%H2266>together:<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>edges<s%> was it coupled <S%H2266>together.<s%>

And the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of his <S%H642>ephod,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, was <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1931>same,<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> thereof; of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H8336>linen;<s%> <S%H7806><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> enclosed <S%H4142>in<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H6605>graven,<s%> as <S%H2368>signets<s%> are <S%H6603>graven,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> that they should be <S%H68>stones<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> like the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod;<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H8336>linen.<s%> <S%H7806><s%>

It <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H7251>foursquare;<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H3717>double:<s%> a <S%H2239>span<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H2239>span<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, being <S%H3717>doubled.<s%>

And they <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones:<s%> the first <S%H2905>row<s%> was a <S%H124>sardius,<s%> a <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and a <S%H1304>carbuncle:<s%> this was the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row.<s%>
And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> an <S%H5306>emerald,<s%> a <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> and a <S%H3095>diamond.<s%>
And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H3958>ligure,<s%> an <S%H7618>agate,<s%> and an <S%H306>amethyst.<s%>

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> an <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and a <S%H3471>jasper:<s%> they were <S%H4142>enclosed<s%> in <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in their <S%H4396>enclosings.<s%>

And the <S%H68>stones<s%> were according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H8034>names,<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> his <S%H8034>name,<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> at the <S%H1383>ends,<s%> of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings;<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> wreathen <S%H5688>chains<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> wreathen <S%H5688>chains<s%> they <S%H5414>fastened<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>ouches,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the shoulder <S%H3802>pieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> it.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8193>border<s%> of it, <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> other <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4480>underneath,<s%> <S%H4295><s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H4136><s%> the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> of it, over <S%H5980>against<s%> the other <S%H4225>coupling<s%> thereof, <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

And they did <S%H7405>bind<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by his <S%H4480>rings<s%> <S%H2885><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> that it might <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> might <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2118>loosed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H646>ephod;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue.<s%>

And there was a <S%H6310>hole<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> as the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of a <S%H8473>habergeon,<s%> with a <S%H8193>band<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H6310>hole,<s%> that it should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7167>rend.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7757>hems<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and <S%H7806>twined<s%> linen.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6472>bells<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%>

A <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in; <S%H8334>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and for his <S%H1121>sons,<s%>

And a <S%H4701>miter<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H6287>goodly<s%> <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> of fine twined <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H7806><s%>

And a <S%H73>girdle<s%> of fine twined <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H7806><s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> of <S%H4639>needlework;<s%> <S%H7551><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6731>plate<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it a <S%H4385>writing,<s%> like to the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> TO THE <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>tied<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> it a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> to <S%H5414>fasten<s%> it on <S%H4480>high<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4701>miter;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Thus was <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H3615>finished:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>furniture,<s%> his <S%H7165>taches,<s%> his <S%H7175>boards,<s%> his <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and his <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and his <S%H134>sockets,<s%>

And the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering,<s%>
<S%H853><s%> The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof, and the mercy <S%H3727>seat,<s%>
<S%H853><s%> The <S%H7979>table,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and the <S%H3899>shewbread,<s%> <S%H6440><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> <S%H853>with<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof, even with the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to be set in <S%H4634>order,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for <S%H3974>light,<s%>

And the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H834>his<s%> <S%H4345>grate<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H905>staves,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot,<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and his <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4340>cords,<s%> and his <S%H3489>pins,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H899>cloths<s%> of <S%H8278>service<s%> to do <S%H8334>service<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> to minister in the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>work.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> did look <S%H7200>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they had <S%H6213>done<s%> it <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> even <S%H3651>so<s%> had they <S%H6213>done<s%> it: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them.
